revised_title: The Structure and Affinities of Matonia Pectinata: A Rare and Elegant Fern
tldr: The author examines the structure and affinities of Matonia pectinata, a rare and elegant fern found only on Mount Ophir in the Malay Peninsula. They study the fern's anatomy, habitat, and growth patterns, as well as its historical and geological context. Matonia pectinata is found to have unique characteristics and is considered a distinct genus, standing alone among existing ferns.
